author: FaeFox (Fae#0009)
install_msg:
Thanks for installing TimeStamps! Please ensure that your bot has the applications.commands permission (granted from the discord developer portal).
This cog contains only slash command(s).

NOTE: Discord may take up to an hour to register slash commands.
name: TimeStamps
description: Create Discord timestamps that automatically update based on the viewer's time zone.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any data or metadata about users.
